alert.note: Alert for Dickey; La Moure; Logan; McIntosh; Stutsman (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 23 at 2:31PM CST until February 23 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST FRIDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills as low as 40 below zero. For the Winter Weather Advisory, blowing snow. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Dickey, LaMoure, Logan, McIntosh, and Stutsman Counties. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Advisory, until Noon CST Friday. For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 6 PM CST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Use caution while outdoors. Wear appropriate winter clothing.

area.areaDesc: Dickey; La Moure; Logan; McIntosh; Stutsman
